title: Discovery of a 1. 0 Ma Yellow River terrace and redating of the fourth Yellow River terrace in Lanzhou area
excerpt: This paper reports the 4th terrace of Yellow River in Lanzhou area
citation: Baotian, P., Huai, S., Chunsheng, H., Ziaofei, H., Tian, Z., & Jijun, L. (2007). Discovery of a 1.0 Ma Yellow River Terrace and redating of the fourth Yellow River terrace in Lanzhou area. Progress in Natural Science, 17, 197-205.
